name: MedicalScholarships
0:
”Alexa, ask Medical Scholarships to find scholarships”
”Alexa, ask Medical Scholarships to find medical scholarships”
”Alexa, ask Medical Scholarships to search for scholarships”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: medical scholarships
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The purpose of this skill, 'Medical Scholarships' is to make it easier, to search for Medical School scholarships. You can even filter by the 3 main categories to find scholarships specific to you.

After you are done searching, you can have a text message sent to you with a link to your results if that is what you choose to do. In doing so, you can have it at your finger tips. (Standard data and text message rates apply. Check with your carrier.)

The 3 main categories you can filter by are:
Gender
 Male
 Female

Citizenship Status
 U.S. Citizen
 Permanent Resident
 Non U.S. Citizen

Academic Year
 1st Year
 2nd Year
 3rd Year
 4th Year

The list of scholarships will be updated on an ongoing basis.

Please note: this is an independent effort to help make, finding medical school scholarships easier. (hope medical school students find it helpful.)
